title: Want to watch the Worlds games in a Voice chat?

embed.description: Check out the Bu: League OCE community on Discord - hang out with 648 other members and enjoy free voice and text chat.

body:
Hi there! My discord has everything you need to watch the games tonight Join the voice call with other watching the games, and even predict the results in our prediction tournament! Hope you enjoy the server, a friendly staff member will greet you when you join! 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
